AutoReplacement.Replacement: SELECT SC.name AS Column_Name, TYPE_NAME(SC.user_type_id) AS Data_Type, SC.max_length AS Max_Length, SC.precision AS Precision, SC.scale AS Scale, IIF(SC.is_nullable = 1, 'YES', 'NO') AS Is_Nullable, IIF(SC.is_identity = 1, 'YES', 'NO') AS Is_Identity, IIF(SC.is_computed = 1, 'YES', 'NO') AS Is_Computed, IIF(SC.default_object_id != 0, 'YES', 'NO') AS Is_Default, Create_Date, Modify_Date FROM sys.views AS SV INNER JOIN sys.columns AS SC ON SV.object_id = SC.object_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(SV.object_id) IN ('') AND SV.name = '' ORDER BY SV.object_id, SC.column_id ;
